profile.name: EVENT_DATE_COMPLETENESS
profile.description: Measure the completeness of an event date.
profile.specification: For values of dwc:eventDate, check is not empty.
profile.label: Event Date Completeness

profile.name: EVENTDATE_FILLED_IN_FROM_VERBATIM
profile.description: Try to populate the event date from the verbatim value.
profile.specification: If a dwc:eventDate is empty and the verbatimEventDate is not empty fill in dwc:eventDate based on value from dwc:verbatimEventDate
profile.label: Event Date From Verbatim

profile.name: UPSTREAM_EVENTDATE_FILLED_IN_FROM_START_END
profile.description: Try to populate the event date from non-Darwin Core start date and end date terms.
profile.specification: If a dwc:eventDate is empty and an event date can be inferred from start date and end date, fill in dwc:eventDate based on the values in the start and end dates.  Will not propose a change if dwc:eventDate contains a value.
profile.label: Event Date From non-Darwin Core start/end

profile.name: EVENTDATE_FORMAT_CORRECTION
profile.description: Try to propose a correction for an event date
profile.specification: Check dwc:eventDate to see if it is empty or contains a valid date value. If it contains a value that is not a valid date, propose a properly formatted eventDate as an amendment.
profile.label: Event Date Format Correction

profile.name: DAY_IN_RANGE
profile.description: Test to see whether a provided day is an integer in the range of values that can be a day of a month.
profile.specification: Compliant if dwc:day is an integer in the range 1 to 31 inclusive, not compliant otherwise. Internal prerequisites not met if day is empty or an integer cannot be parsed from day.
profile.label: Day In Range

profile.name: EVENT_DATE_DURATION_SECONDS
profile.description: Measure the duration of an event date in seconds.
profile.specification: For values of dwc:eventDate, calculate the duration in seconds.
profile.label: Event Date Duration In Seconds

profile.name: DAY_MONTH_TRANSPOSED
profile.description: Check of month is out of range for months, but day is in range for months, and propose a transposition of the two if this is the case.
profile.specification: If dwc:month and dwc:day are provided, propose a transposition if day is in range for months, and month is in range for days
profile.label: Day Month Transposition

profile.name: MONTH_IN_RANGE
profile.description: Test to see whether a provided month is in the range of integer values that form months of the year.
profile.specification: Compliant if month is an integer in the range 1 to 12 inclusive, otherwise not compliant. Internal prerequisites not met if month is empty or an integer cannot be parsed from month.
profile.label: Month In Range

profile.name: EVENTDATE_PRECISON_JULIAN_YEAR_OR_BETTER
profile.description: Test to see whether a provided event date has a duration less than or equal to a standard astronomical Julian year.
profile.specification: Compliant if event date has a duration equal to or less than a = 31557600 seconds, otherwise not compliant. Internal prerequisites not met if eventDate is empty or not valid.
profile.label: EventDate precision Julian year or better.

profile.name: EVENTDATE_PRECISON_YEAR_OR_BETTER
profile.description: Test to see whether a provided event date has a duration less than or equal to a calendar year.
profile.specification: Compliant if event date has a duration equal to or less than 365 days if a standard year, 366 days if a leap year. Internal prerequisites not met if eventDate is empty or not valid.
profile.label: EventDate precision calendar year or better.

profile.name: DAY_POSSIBLE_FOR_MONTH_YEAR
profile.description: Check if a value for day is consistent with a provided month and year.
profile.specification: Check that the value of dwc:eventDate is consistent with the values for dwc:month and dwc:year. Requires valid values for month and year.
profile.label: Day Consistent With Month/Year

initialValues.dwc:locality: Wenatchee National Forest. South Cle Elum Ridge.
